name: Indian Royal Princess Engage
description:
*** It’s amazing Best Indian Royal Princess Engagement ***

Let’s play amazing new Indian Royal Princess Engagement game for all ages. Engagement is very important in every Indian life. Each family celebrate like festival. So are you ready to play this game?

Help to Indian girls for here engagement. In this there are so many different levels. Play one by one and unlock new levels. This all levels are also free. Indian girl wan’t to look like more fashionable in her own engagement.

In this game first level is card decoration. In this you need to select colour, greeting text, design etc. Then second level is you need to post card on post office. In third levels you need to decorate ring. After fourth levels you need to decorate ring for groom. After you need to completed bridal spa. In this there are so many location and cream which apply one by one and completed spa levels.

Then after Hand mehandi to decorate hand with amazing art and design. Then after leg mehandi to decorate lag with amazing art and design. After completed you need to makeup or girl. Apply one by one makeup items and completed this session then dress up.

In this there are colourful dress up. Choose your like dress up and completed dresses girl. Then Groom dress up. In this there are so many dresses for groom. And at last to time for engagement. In this to wear ring each other couple.

So are you excited to play this game?

Features:
=======
- All levels are free.
- HD beautiful graphics with Indian Girl Character.
- Easy to play and apply all tools.
- Most relaxing spa with number of tools.
- Number of glamorous makeup options!
- Wonderful henna/mehndi designs
- Attractive ornaments like bangles, necklaces, earrings, nose rings etc.
- So many different levels.
- Share your design with your friends and family.

So are you ready for play this game? Download Now
